snippet: There's some potentially good news for the thousands of overseas nationals living in Turkey and confused about their legal and health-care status. Turkish authorities have scheduled a meeting with overseas diplomats in Ankara for Thursday to clarify...
abstract: There's some potentially good news for the thousands of overseas nationals living in Turkey and confused about their legal and health-care status. Turkish authorities have scheduled a meeting with overseas diplomats in Ankara for Thursday to clarify the new universal health insurance mandate.
